title: Schneider Electric's new research shows that digital and electric solutions can cut carbon emissions in office buildings ... - PR Newswire
summary: A new study by Schneider Electric shows that retrofitting buildings using a digital-first approach can significantly reduce carbon emissions, up to 70% in office buildings. The research highlights the benefits of digital and electric solutions for building decarbonization, emphasizing the potential for reducing operational emissions and achieving net-zero targets. This approach is seen as less disruptive and more effective than traditional renovations, resulting in faster results and lower upfront carbon emissions.

greenwashing: The article doesn't suggest any evidence of greenwashing, instead presenting a genuine effort towards reducing environmental impact through technology and innovation.
